-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are numerous hidden tricks of Sort & Filter which makes data analysis and manoeuvring accurate and fast. This section focusses on: 
  • Vertical Sort - 1-level & 2-level
  • Custom Sort
  • Sort Trick - add alternate blank rows in-between existing rows
  • Horizontal Sorting (Left to Right) - auto-realigning 100s of columns
  • Filter - Basics
  • Filter - Choosing the dataset correctly
  • Filter analysis with shortcuts
  • Filter - SUBTOTAL() for calculations
  • Filter - SUBTOTAL() 9 vs. 109 series
  • Filter - Applying 2 or more Filters simultaneously on the same sheet
  • Filter - Color Filter & Text Filter
  • Advanced Filter - Basics
  • Advanced Filter - Differential Criteria
  • Advanced Filter - More parameters

We have 14 videos of duration 45 mins. Through practical examples, You'll learn Ninja level application on  Excel: Sort & Filter Tricks - Basics to Ninja .

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Question - Why should I take this mini-course on Excel?

Our Response - Sort and Filter are the two most commonly used MIS reporting techniques. Having an in-depth knowledge helps avoid silly mistakes commonly made by professionals while using them.

  • Focus is also on learning hidden tips and tricks. E.g. Horizontal Sorting (Left to Right) - auto-realigning 100s of columns, Advanced filter
  • Do's & Don'ts

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Question – So will I learn Pivot table, Vlookup?

Our Response – No. This course covers Excel: Sort & Filter Tricks - Basics to Ninja .
